table.name: vtiger_tswhatsapp
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tswhatsapp` ( `tswhatsappid` int NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `wapaid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `contactid` int DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `content` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `media` text, `media_type` text, `error` text, `data` text, `datetime` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`tswhatsappid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_tswhatsappcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tswhatsappcf` ( `tswhatsappid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`tswhatsappid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
